Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.faith_track

Class FaithTrack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.faith_track.FaithTrack
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStatus, WinPointsCountable
public class FaithTrack extends Object implements WinPointsCountable, HasStatus
The FaithTrack class represents the faith track on the player's personal board.
